page.title: 06Transport
page.content: To live in a country area like this with your own transport is very pleasant but being dependant on public transport can make life very difficult especially for those searching for employment and the elderly. It is a myth to say that everyone has a car, what is more, the cost of public transport in country areas is very high and the service can be unreliable even if the normal timing is appropriate. Many services of the local authority are based at{Retford}(11 miles) and {Worksop}(17 miles) and it is only in the last few years that there has been a bus service to Retford,there is none to Worksop. The{nearest Rail sevice}is at Gainsborough, the main London -Edinburgh Line is at Retford.
